predicate.note: Frames file for 'title' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'name' and 'entitle'.

example.name: passive
example.text: In a July analysis titled [*] `` From Euphoria to Despair , '' W.I. Carr ( Far East ) Ltd. , another securities firm , said that eroding confidence might undermine future economic development .

example.name: transitive
example.text: After four year of tinkering and $ 2.4 million [*U*] in seed money , the board set up the new marketplace , titled it the Chicago Board Options Exchange , and named Sullivan its first president .
example.arg: After four year of tinkering and $ 2.4 million [*U*] in seed money
